questions.question: …………………. I was searching for a book, I came across this old photograph.
questions.description: While shows time. It is used to talk about two actions or situations that happen simultaneously.

questions.question: They live ……………………. the climate is good.
questions.description: Where is a relative adverb indicating place. It can connect two clauses.

questions.question: This is the hotel …………………. our meetings used to take place.
questions.description: Where means in which or at which.

questions.question: The boy ……………………. watch had been stolen complained to the police.
The weather …………………….. fine we went out for a walk.
The germ is ………………….. small to be seen with the naked eye.
…………………… his poor health, he attends the office regularly.
questions.description: In spite of is a preposition. It is used before a noun.

questions.question: ……………………. on tip-toe, he reached for the apple.
…………………….. she got the message, she started for home.
……………………….. he is working, he should not be disturbed.
questions.description: All of these words show reason.

questions.question: No sooner had Venu arrived ……………………. his mother followed.
questions.description: No sooner is a comparative expression use than after it.

questions.question: He tip-toed into the room ……………………. he should disturb the class.
